 <div class="CTitle">spoututils</div>
 <div class="NDClassPrototype" id="NDClassPrototype655"><div class="CPEntry TClass Current"><div class="CPModifiers"><span class="SHKeyword">namespace</span> </div><div class="CPName">spoututils</div></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Namespace for utility functions.</p><ul><li><p>Version</p></li><li><p>Console</p></li><li><p>Logs</p></li><li><p>MessageBox dialog</p></li><li><p>Registry utilities</p></li><li><p>Computer information</p></li><li><p>Timing utilities</p></li></ul><p>Refer to source code for documentation.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="IsLaptop"></a><a name="Topic658"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">IsLaptop</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype658" class="NDPrototype"><div class="PSection PPlainSection"><span class="SHKeyword">bool</span> IsLaptop()</div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Return whether the system is a laptop.</p><p>Queries power status. Most likely a laptop if battery power is available.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="GetCurrentModule"></a><a name="Topic659"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">GetCurrentModule()</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype659" class="NDPrototype"><div class="PSection PPlainSection">HMODULE GetCurrentModule()</div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Get the module handle of a process.</p><p>This method is necessary if the process is a dll</p><p><a href="https://gist.github.com/davidruhmann/8008844" target="_top">https://&#8203;gist&#8203;.github&#8203;.com&#8203;/davidruhmann&#8203;/8008844</a></p></div>
</div>

<a name="OpenSpoutConsole"></a><a name="Topic666"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">OpenSpoutConsole</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype666" class="NDPrototype"><div class="PSection PPlainSection"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> OpenSpoutConsole()</div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Open console window.</p><p>A console window opens without logs.&nbsp; Useful for debugging with console output.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="CloseSpoutConsole"></a><a name="Topic667"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">CloseSpoutConsole</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype667" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> CloseSpoutConsole(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="PType first"><span class="SHKeyword">bool</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">bWarning</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Close console window.</p><p>The optional warning displays a MessageBox if user notification is required.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="Logs"></a><a name="Topic668"></a><div class="CTopic TGroup LC">
 <div class="CTitle">Logs</div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Spout logs are used thoughout the SDK and are printed to a console with EnableLogs or saved to a file with EnableLogFIle.</p><p>You can set the level above which the logs are shown SPOUT_LOG_SILENT&nbsp; : SPOUT_LOG_VERBOSE : SPOUT_LOG_NOTICE (default) SPOUT_LOG_WARNING : SPOUT_LOG_ERROR&nbsp; : SPOUT_LOG_FATAL For example, to show only warnings and errors (you shouldn't see any) or leave set to default Notice to see more information.</p><p>SetSpoutLogLevel(SPOUT_LOG_WARNING);</p><p>You can instead, or additionally, output to a text log file with the name and extension of your choice.&nbsp; EnableSpoutLogFile(&quot;OF Spout Graphics sender.log&quot;);</p><p>The log file is re-created every time the application starts unless you specify to append to the existing one : EnableSpoutLogFile(&quot;OF Spout Graphics sender.log&quot;, true);</p><p>The file is saved in the %AppData% folder unless you specify the full path.&nbsp; C:&gt;Users&gt;username&gt;AppData&gt;Roaming&gt;Spout</p><p>If there is no file specified, the executable or dll name is used.</p><p>After the application has run you can find and examine the log file</p><p>This folder can also be shown in Windows Explorer directly from the application.&nbsp; ShowSpoutLogs();</p><p>Or the entire log file can be returned as a string std::string logstring = GetSpoutLog();</p><p>You can also create your own logs For example : SpoutLog(&quot;SpoutLog test&quot;);</p><p>Or specify the logging level : For example : SpoutLogNotice(&quot;Important notice&quot;); or : SpoutLogFatal(&quot;This should not happen&quot;); or : SetSpoutLogLevel(SPOUT_LOG_VERBOSE); SpoutLogVerbose(&quot;Message&quot;);</p><p>See SpoutUtils.h for mre information</p></div>
</div>

<a name="Log_level_definitions"></a><a name="Topic669"></a><div class="CTopic TEnumeration LC">
 <div class="CTitle">Log level definitions</div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>The level above which the logs are shown.</p><table class="CDefinitionList"><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_SILENT"></a><a name="Topic670"></a>SPOUT_LOG_SILENT</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Disable all messages.</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_VERBOSE"></a><a name="Topic671"></a>SPOUT_LOG_VERBOSE</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Show all messages.</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_NOTICE"></a><a name="Topic672"></a>SPOUT_LOG_NOTICE</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Show information messages (default).</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_WARNING"></a><a name="Topic673"></a>SPOUT_LOG_WARNING</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Show warning, errors and fatal.</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_ERROR"></a><a name="Topic674"></a>SPOUT_LOG_ERROR</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Show errors and fatal.</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_FATAL"></a><a name="Topic675"></a>SPOUT_LOG_FATAL</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Show only fatal errors.</p></td></tr><tr><td class="CDLEntry"><a name="SPOUT_LOG_NONE"></a><a name="Topic676"></a>SPOUT_LOG_NONE</td><td class="CDLDefinition"><p>Ignore log levels.</p></td></tr></table><p>For example, to show only warnings and errors (you shouldn't see any):</p><p>SetSpoutLogLevel(SPOUT_LOG_WARNING);</p></div>
</div>

<a name="EnableSpoutLog"></a><a name="Topic677"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">EnableSpoutLog</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype677" class="NDPrototype"><div class="PSection PPlainSection"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> EnableSpoutLog()</div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Enable logging to the console.</p><p>Logs are displayed in a console window.&nbsp; Useful for program development.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="EnableSpoutLogFile"></a><a name="Topic678"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">EnableSpoutLogFile</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype678" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> EnableSpoutLogFile(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first"><span class="SHKeyword">const</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">char</span>*&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">filename,</td></tr><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">bool</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">bAppend</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Enable logging to a file with optional append.</p><p>As well as a console window, you can output logs to a text file.&nbsp; Default extension is &quot;.log&quot; unless the full path is used.&nbsp; For no file name or path the executable name is used.</p><p>Example : EnableSpoutLogFile(&quot;Sender.log&quot;);</p><p>The log file is re-created every time the application starts unless you specify to append to the existing one.</p><p>Example : EnableSpoutLogFile(&quot;Sender.log&quot;, true);</p><p>The file is saved in the %AppData% folder unless you specify the full path :</p><p>C:&gt;Users&gt;username&gt;AppData&gt;Roaming&gt;Spout</p><p>You can find and examine the log file after the application has run.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="DisableSpoutLogFile"></a><a name="Topic679"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">DisableSpoutLogFile</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype679" class="NDPrototype"><div class="PSection PPlainSection"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> DisableSpoutLogFile()</div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Disable logging to file</p></div>
</div>

<a name="RemoveSpoutLogFile"></a><a name="Topic680"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">RemoveSpoutLogFile</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype680" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">void</span> RemoveSpoutLogFile(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first"><span class="SHKeyword">const</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">char</span>*&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">filename</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Remove a log file</p></div>
</div>

<a name="MessageBox"></a><a name="Topic698"></a><div class="CTopic TGroup LC">
 <div class="CTitle">MessageBox</div>
</div>

<a name="SpoutMessageBox"></a><a name="Topic699"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">SpoutMessageBox</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype699" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">int</span> SpoutMessageBox(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first"><span class="SHKeyword">const</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">char</span>*&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">message,</td></tr><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">DWORD&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">dwMilliseconds</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>MessageBox dialog with optional timeout.&nbsp; The dialog closes itself if a timeout is specified.</p></div>
</div>

<a name="SpoutMessageBox(6)"></a><a name="Topic704"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">SpoutMessageBox</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype704" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">int</span> SPOUT_DLLEXP SpoutMessageBox(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">HWND&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">hwnd,</td></tr><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">LPCSTR&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">message,</td></tr><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">LPCSTR&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">caption,</td></tr><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">UINT&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">uType,</td></tr><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first">std::</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">string</span>&amp;&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">text</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>MessageBox dialog with edit control for text input Can be used in place of a specific application resource dialog o For message content, the control is in the footer area o If no message, the control is in the main content area o All SpoutMessageBox functions such as user icon and buttons are available</p></div>
</div>

<a name="RemoveSubKey"></a><a name="Topic721"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">RemoveSubKey</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype721" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">bool</span> RemoveSubKey(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="first"></td><td class="PType">HKEY&nbsp;</td><td></td><td class="PName last">hKey,</td></tr><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first"><span class="SHKeyword">const</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">char</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PSymbols">*</td><td class="PName last">subkey</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Delete a subkey and its values.</p><p>The &quot;subkey&quot; argument must be a subkey of the key that hKey identifies, but it cannot have subkeys.</p><p>Note that key names are not case sensitive.</p></div>
</div>

</div>

<a name="ExecuteProcess"></a><a name="Topic726"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC">
 <div class="CTitle">ExecuteProcess</div>

 <div class="CBody"><p>Open process using ShellExecuteEx</p></div>
</div>

<a name="OpenSpoutPanel"></a><a name="Topic727"></a><div class="CTopic TFunction LC last">
 <div class="CTitle">OpenSpoutPanel</div>
 <div id="NDPrototype727" class="NDPrototype WideForm"><div class="PSection PParameterSection CStyle"><table><tr><td class="PBeforeParameters"><span class="SHKeyword">bool</span> OpenSpoutPanel(</td><td class="PParametersParentCell"><table class="PParameters"><tr><td class="PModifierQualifier first"><span class="SHKeyword">const</span>&nbsp;</td><td class="PType"><span class="SHKeyword">char</span>*&nbsp;</td><td class="PName last">message</td></tr></table></td><td class="PAfterParameters">)</td></tr></table></div></div>
 <div class="CBody"><p>Open SpoutPanel.exe with command line for SpoutMessageBox as a modeless dialog &quot;SpoutMessageBoxModeless&quot; must have been previously called</p></div>
</div>

</body></html>
